title: Stir-fried broccoli with chilli and garlic

default: ½ head broccoli, cut into florets
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the olive oil in a wok over a high heat. Add the garlic, broccoli and chilli flakes and stir fry for 5-6 minutes.
Add the soy sauce, and season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
To serve, place the stir-fried broccoli onto a serving plate with a dipping dish of soy sauce on the side if desired.
